22  :
23  mLUsolver(0) {

26 
27  void VArma2TF::execute(VDmatrix& AR, VDmatrix& MA, Cmatrix& TF) {
28 
29  if (MA.size() == 0) {
30  throw "VArma2TF::execute - no MA part";
31  }
32 
33  unsigned int channels = MA[0].size1();
34 
35  if (channels * (channels + 1) / 2 != TF.size1()) {
36  throw bad_matrix_size("VArma2TF::execute");
37  }
38 
39  double p = 2.0 * M_PI / (2.0 * (TF.size2() - 1));
40  Cdouble z(1.0, 0.0);
41  Cdouble dz(cos(p), sin(p));
42 
43  for (unsigned int j = 0; j < TF.size2(); j++) {
44  Cmatrix num(channels, channels);
45  Cmatrix den(channels, channels);
46  if (MA.size() < AR.size()) {
47  Cdouble zk(1.0, 0.0);
48  unsigned int k;
49  for (k = 0; k < MA.size(); k++) {
50  num += MA[k] * zk;
51  den += AR[k] * zk;
52  zk = zk*z;
53  }
54  for (; k < AR.size(); k++) {
55  den += AR[k] * zk;
56  zk = zk*z;
57  }
58  } else {
59  Cdouble zk(1.0, 0.0);
60  unsigned int k;
61  for (k = 0; k < AR.size(); k++) {
62  num += MA[k] * zk;
63  den += AR[k] * zk;
64  zk = zk*z;
65  }
66  for (; k < MA.size(); k++) {
67  num += MA[k] * zk;
68  zk = zk*z;
69  }
70  }
71 
72 
73  mLUsolver.execute(den, num);
74 
75  unsigned int p = 0;
76  for (unsigned int row = 0; row < channels; row++) {
77  for (unsigned int col = row; col < channels; col++) {
78 
79  TF(p, j) = num(row, col);
80  p++;
81 
82  }
83  }
84  z = z*dz;
85  }
86  }
